SEARCH
Package Network.ClientSide

Class Client

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Network.ClientSide.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, GameModelObserver, LivingRoomObserver, PersonalGoalObserver, PlayerObserver, ShelfObserver, ViewObserver
Direct Known Subclasses:
RemoteClientImplementation
public abstract class Client extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ViewObserver, LivingRoomObserver, ShelfObserver, PlayerObserver, GameModelObserver, PersonalGoalObserver
This abstract class contains all the methods that provides the expected functionalities provided by a RemoteClient.

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client(String serverAddress, int portNum, View userInterface) throws RemoteException
      This method creates an instance of Client and saves the network parameters of the RemoteServer it will try to log into.
      Parameters:
      serverAddress - the ipAddress of the RemoteServer
      portNum - the number of the socketPort of the RemoteServer
      userInterface - the View that the user is currently using
      Throws:
      RemoteException - an Exception that notifies an error in the connection with the RemoteServer

  • Method Details

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname(String nickName)
      This method sets the nickname of the Player using this RemoteClient in the RemoteClient itself.
      Parameters:
      nickName - a String containing the nickname of the Player

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Returns:
      the nickname of the Player using this RemoteClient

    • getServerAddress

      public String getServerAddress()
      Returns:
      the ipAddress of the RemoteServer into which the Client is logged into

    • getPortNum

      public int getPortNum()
      Returns:
      the portNum of the RemoteServer into which the Client is logged into

    • connectionInit

      public abstract void connectionInit() throws Exception
      This method creates the connection between the Client and the RemoteServer.
      Throws:
      Exception - an Exception that notifies an error in the connection with the RemoteServer

    • onModelModify

      public abstract void onModelModify(TurnView turnView, Event event)
      This method allows the RemoteClient to trace the specific event that triggered the notification of a change in the GameModel.
      Parameters:
      turnView - an updated instance of TurnView
      event - the Event that triggered the notification
